description:
Heading out for a hike with a chance of swimming or just a chill afternoon in the park, if the sun is shining, these shorts will keep you comfy. Made from a light, quick drying ripstop nylon, the Pull-On Adventure shorts are great for days that start on the trails and end on a patio.

  • Lightweight blend of recycled nylon in a tough ripstop weave
  • FlashDry-XD™ finish sheds showers, dries quickly, and keeps your shorts cleaner longer
  • Dual front pockets and a zippered rear pocket
  • Elasticized waistband and drawcord combo for cinching in the perfect fit
  • Relaxed fit has a casual all day comfort
name: The North Face Pull-On Adventure Short - Men's
